config.bonustut: Choose one of five light balls to get rewards
config.wildtut: Wild substitutes for all symbols except
config.bounstut: triggers the casino implosion feature select a casino to implode win up to 500x the triggering bet
config.freetut: If the player gets at least three freespin symbols, then he shall play the FreeSpin. If the player gets four freespin symbols, then the final win will be multiplied be 3. For five freespin symbols it will be multiplied by 10.
config.freewildtut: During free spins, Wild substitutes for all symbols. Any Wild appearing will be held in place for remaining free spins.
